ChatFilter - 永远不会看到任何脏话！

使用插件“ChatFilter”，您可以向文件添加脏话，不允许玩家发出去。
用法：
使用/ chatfilter命令将脏话添加到列表中！
 
您可以使用以下指令：
/chatfilter ADD - >向列表中添加脏话
/chatfilte REMOVE - >从列表中删除脏话
/chatfilte LIST - >列出所有禁止的脏话
/chatfilte RELOAD - >重新加载配置

权限：
权限很简单。
filter.admin- > use /chatfilter and bypass the filter不会翻译
filter.bypass- >bypass the filter不会翻译    
 配置:
# Configuration file for the ChatFilter plugin
# Use this file to edit the messages of the plugin

Prefix: '&7[&bChatFilter&7]'
NoPermission: '%prefix% &cYou dont have permission to use this command!'
ListMessage: '%prefix% &eForbidden words:'
ListLayout: '%prefix% &7- &b%word%'
NoBannedWords: '%prefix% &cThere are no banned words.'
Usage: '%prefix% &cUsage: &7/chatfilter <ADD | REMOVE | LIST | RELOAD> [<Word>]'
SuccessfullyAdded: '%prefix% &aYou successfully added the word &e%word%'
SuccessfullyRemoved: '%prefix% &aYou successfully removed the word &e%word%'
SavingError: '%prefix% &cAn error occured while attempting to save the word to the file. Please see the console for more information.'
WordNotForbidden: '%prefix% &cThe word is not forbidden.'
NotPlayer: '%prefix% &cYou need to be a player!'
ConfigReloaded: '%prefix% &aThe config was successfully reloaded!'复制代码
